Subject: Not detecting Destination Details
Description: The customer has DPI enabled so they can see where a file is uploaded to, but they are not getting any information.
What_We_Know__c:
the customer is experiencing issues with destination details not showing up
I opened an R&D escalation after we collected the logs
enabled reporting V2 as per R&D suggestion
this help a bit, but there are still entries without destination details
reported this to R&D with extra logs, they let me know that monitoring text/plain files cause a lot of false positives and there is a fix for this, which is targeted for server version 5.9.5.0.
I informed the customer about this
Next_Steps__c: waiting on the customer to answer
Solution_Comment__c:
info provided to customer: fake positives caused by monitoring text files, fix will be available in 5941
logged new issue under ticket no. 00432892
